tables.invitation:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_invitation` (
  `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `type_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `poster_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `parent_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `parent_user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `poster_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `parent_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `object_id` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `object_type` varchar(32) DEFAULT '',
  `created_at` datetime NOT NULL,
  `params` text,
  `read` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `mitigated` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.invitation_type:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_invitation_type` (
  `id` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `handler` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,
  `title` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,
  `is_active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `is_push` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `is_mail` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `is_sms` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `module_name` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'core',
  `show_on_user_config` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
